title: Broken Login Page
description: Users are unable to login, receiving an error message after submitting credentials.

title: 404 Error on Profile Page
description: Users are getting a 404 error when trying to access their profile page.

title: Product Image Not Loading
description: Product images are not loading on the product detail page.

title: Checkout Button Not Functional
description: Users are unable to proceed to checkout as the checkout button is not working.

title: Incorrect Pricing Display
description: Product prices are displaying incorrectly on the product listing page.

title: Broken Contact Form
description: Users are unable to submit messages through the contact form on the website.

title: Slow Page Load Times
description: Pages on the website are loading very slowly, affecting user experience.

title: Missing Product Descriptions
description: Some product descriptions are missing from the product detail pages.

title: Search Functionality Not Working
description: Users are unable to search for products as the search functionality is not working.

title: Broken Navigation Menu
description: The navigation menu is not working properly on mobile devices.

title: Incorrect Billing Information on Checkout
description: Users are reporting that their billing information is incorrect after completing the checkout process.

title: Broken Add to Cart Button
description: The 'Add to Cart' button is not functioning when users try to add products to their cart.

title: Incorrect Sorting on Product Listing
description: Products on the listing page are not sorted correctly based on user preferences.

title: Broken Forgot Password Functionality
description: Users are unable to reset their password using the 'Forgot Password' feature.

title: Text Overlaps on Mobile View
description: Text content is overlapping on the website when viewed on mobile devices.
